law.catch_line: Unless restricted by the charter or bylaws of the corporation, a corporation may allow stockholders ...

text.section: Unless restricted by the charter or bylaws of the corporation, a corporation may allow stockholders to participate in a meeting by means of a conference telephone or other communications equipment if all persons participating in the meeting can hear each other at the same time.
Participation in a meeting by the means authorized by subsection (a) of this section constitutes presence in person at the meeting.
